name: Garchomp
author: Akira Komayama
flavor_text: It flies at the speed of sound while searching for prey, and it has midair battles with Salamence as the two compete for food.

abilities.name: Avenging Aura
abilities.effect: If you have more Prize cards remaining than your opponent, this Pokémon’s attacks do 80 more damage to your opponent’s Active Pokémon (before applying Weakness and Resistance).

attacks.name: Over Slice
attacks.effect: You may discard an Energy from this Pokémon. If you do, this attack does 40 more damage.
